EmailTemplate.subject: Join us for a webinar on TruTrak integration Sept 24 - 5pm MDT

<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]> WEBINARBendixKing / TruTrak Integration – Discussion and Forum
Date: September 24th, 2019 Time: 5 PM MDT
TruTrak has long been a leader in low-cost autopilots for experimental and certified aircraft, and they will continue that legacy within BendixKing. As valued customers of TruTrak and BendixKing, we wanted to invite you to a webinar to give you the inside scoop on certifications, new features and talk about the integration of TruTrak into BendixKing’s product line and how that will affect your product purchases and support moving forward.
Join Andrew Barker, Vice President of Americas Aftermarket and Experimental Sales, along with Steven Pearce, Product Marketing Manager of Flight Controls and avid pilot, as they walk you through the BendixKing integration of TruTrak.
Topics include:
- How to start buying new products immediately - Support for existing TruTrak products - Mooney Certification - Exciting product updates - What the future integration of TruTrak will look like - TruTrak website and social channels – what next
REGISTER NOW <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_KjsXVx-8RlOIZACSSBRzDQ]]>
